body: another long one with nothing of real interest, 3/10

Day 1- Manga 15*
We finally found the users of the holy dick that shines brighter than the sun. Putting that aside, the art is mediocre and I couldn't read the story. I'll give it a 3/10. If you didn't know, if I can't read the story, it will not count to the review.
See y'all next time.
